accessibility_text:
#### ACCESSIBILITY STATEMENT

At the Junior Center of Art and Science, we believe creativity and exploration should be accessible to everyone. We are committed to providing inclusive and welcoming experiences—both online and in person—for people of all ages, abilities, and backgrounds.

#### DIGITAL ACCESSIBILITY

We are actively working to ensure our website is accessible to individuals with disabilities and compatible with assistive technologies such as screen readers, screen magnifiers, voice recognition software, and alternative input devices.

If you encounter any barriers while using our website or need materials in an alternative format, we encourage you to reach out—we’re happy to help.

#### ON-SITE ACCESSIBILITY

Our physical space is designed with accessibility in mind. Features include:

  * 2 handicap parking spaces with ramp to sidewalk 
  * Wheelchair-accessible entrances and restrooms
  * Wide doorways and navigable layouts
  * Service animals are always welcome
  * Seating available in every room
  * Staff available to assist upon request  

We are continually working to improve the accessibility of our facilities. If you have specific needs prior to your visit, please don’t hesitate to contact us.

#### INCLUSIVE PROGRAMS & SUPPORT

We offer programs designed to support a wide range of learners, including:

  * Hands-on programs adaptable for different physical and sensory needs
  * Teachers that welcome and have experience with neurodiverse participants, wi...
collections_text:
# Inspiring creativity and community through art & science

Register for Programs

See Upcoming Events

## **join us today**

## **After-school** Enrichment

**enriching classes at our creative oasis on the lake**

  * small class sizes and age ranges from 6-13
  * visual arts, creative coding, carpenty, and _so much more_
  * beautiful setting

[learn more](http://web.archive.org/web/20251115185625/https://juniorcenter.org/?page_id=4852)

## **Winter Break Camp**

**give yourself a break during the school break**

  * two day camp during the winter school break
  * for ages 6-11
  * festive & fun projects like luminaries and digitally designed greeting cards

LEARN MORE

## **Couture Crafting**

**because adults deserve art classes too!**

  * third annual 21+ holiday crafting fundraiser
  * five stations including giant snowflakes and lino print wrapping paper
  * drinks & snacks included!

[LEARN MORE](http://web.archive.org/web/20251115185625/https://juniorcenter.org/?p=8143)
